title: Implement Update() for keyboard input handling
description:
Handle tea.KeyMsg in Update():

Priority order:
1. If showComplete: any key except 'q' dismisses, 'q' quits
2. If showHelp: any key dismisses help
3. Global keys (always work):
   - q/ctrl+c: set quitting=true, return tea.Quit
   - ?: toggle showHelp
   - p: toggle paused, send to pauseChan
   - tab: cycle focusedPane (Status->Tasks->Output->Status)

4. Pane-specific navigation using msg.String():
   When focusedPane == PaneTasks:
   - j/down: increment selectedTask (clamp to bounds)
   - k/up: decrement selectedTask (clamp to bounds)
   - g: selectedTask = 0
   - G: selectedTask = len(tasks)-1

   When focusedPane == PaneOutput:
   - j/down: viewport.LineDown(1)
   - k/up: viewport.LineUp(1)
   - ctrl+d/pgdn: viewport.HalfViewDown()
   - ctrl+u/pgup: viewport.HalfViewUp()
   - g: viewport.GotoTop()
   - G: viewport.GotoBottom()

Use msg.String() for reliable key matching (not key.Matches).
